001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
008import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.R;
010
011/**
012 * A simple {@link Fragment} subclass. Use the {@link SettingsFragment#newInstance} factory method
013 * to create an instance of this fragment.
014 */
015@AndroidEntryPoint
016public class SettingsFragment extends Fragment {
017
018  // TODO: Rename parameter arguments, choose names that match
019  // the fragment initialization parameters, e.g. ARG_ITEM_NUMBER
020  private static final String ARG_PARAM1 = "param1";
021  private static final String ARG_PARAM2 = "param2";
022
023  // TODO: Rename and change types of parameters
024  private String mParam1;
025  private String mParam2;
026
027  public SettingsFragment() {
028    // Required empty public constructor
029  }
030
031  /**
032   * Use this factory method to create a new instance of this fragment using the provided
033   * parameters.
034   *
035   * @param param1 Parameter 1.
036   * @param param2 Parameter 2.
037   * @return A new instance of fragment SettingsFragment.
038   */
039  // TODO: Rename and change types and number of parameters
040  public static SettingsFragment newInstance(String param1, String param2) {
041    SettingsFragment fragment = new SettingsFragment();
042    Bundle args = new Bundle();
043    args.putString(ARG_PARAM1, param1);
044    args.putString(ARG_PARAM2, param2);
045    fragment.setArguments(args);
046    return fragment;
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
051    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
052    if (getArguments() != null) {
053      mParam1 = getArguments().getString(ARG_PARAM1);
054      mParam2 = getArguments().getString(ARG_PARAM2);
055    }
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container,
060      Bundle savedInstanceState) {
061    // Inflate the layout for this fragment
062    return inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_settings, container, false);
063  }
064}
